scripts.start: npm run ins && npm run un && npm run ins && node index.js
scripts.un: npm uninstall puppeteer && npm uninstall better-sqlite3 && npm uninstall quick.db && npm uninstall moment && npm uninstall npm-check-updates && npm uninstall discord-webhook-node && npm uninstall chromium
scripts.ins: npm install puppeteer && npm install better-sqlite3 && npm install quick.db && npm install moment && npm install npm-check-updates && npm install discord-webhook-node && npm install chromium
